question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Na ktorom brehu rieky sa nachádza centrum mesta Uppsala vo Švédsku?
answer: Centrum mesta Uppsala vo Švédsku sa nachádza na východnom brehu rieky Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The city centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the east bank of the Fyrisån River.
